title: How much does it cost to replace an LCD screen? - Quora

response.answer_text: LCD TV repair typically costs $60 to $85 for diagnostics testing, and $200 to $300 to perform repairs. Minimum Cost: $60 National Average Cost: $207 Maximum Cost: $350 Average Range: $84 to $300 For mobile phone that out of warranty, replacing the glass screen costs $129-$329. Additional repairs, such as to the LCD or digitizer layer, cost anywhere from $149 to $599. So it depends what kind of brand, model, type or manufacture years for replacement. Sometimes, discontinue or faulty product will be have a problem for replacement or repaired and might be cost higher than you might expected.
That’s not much infor to go on. Is the screen of a phone? A tablet? A 60” TV? And what brand and model is the device?
